fib=[1,1]
while(len(str(fib[-1]))<=101):
	fib+=[fib[-1]+fib[-2]]

def flooring(s,e,k):
	global fib
	if(s>e):
		return s-1
	else:
		m=(s+e)/2
		if(k==fib[m]):
			return m
		elif(k<fib[m]):
			return flooring(s,m-1,k)
		else:
			return flooring(m+1,e,k)

def ceiling(s,e,k):
	global fib
	if(s>e):
		return s
	else:
		m=(s+e)/2
		if(k==fib[m]):
			return m
		elif(k<fib[m]):
			return ceiling(s,m-1,k)
		else:
			return ceiling(m+1,e,k)

while(True):
	line=raw_input().split(' ')
	l=int(line[0])
	r=int(line[1])
	if(l==0 and r==0):
		break
	else:
		print flooring(0,len(fib)-1,r)-ceiling(0,len(fib)-1,l)+1
